message.content:
{"id": "118780", "title": "Bug 118780: Column aliases in dataset are not reflected in expression builder", "description": "When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.", "OB": "When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder should display the updated column aliases when selecting the dataset.", "EB": "Currently, the expression builder still shows the old column names instead of the column aliases when selecting the dataset.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, e.g., 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Notice that it still shows the old column names instead of the column aliases."}
